Detailed Description

Interface for calculation parameters of the new file name for any file item.

See also:
IFileNaming

Definition at line 17 of file IFileNamingParams.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ifpf::IFileNamingParams::RenamingMode

Strategy mode.

Enumerator:
RM_OVERWRITE  Output file name is equals the input file name.
RM_NUMBERING  Output file name will be automatic numbered if the file already exists.
